Title: The Warchief and the Darkness
Description: I see now how the Alliance king leads his people. But what is the Horde warchief up to? Just below us, a swarm of goblins are burrowing into the sacred vale on his orders. What does he hope to find there? We must find out!
ObjectivesText: Complete the "Dark Heart of Pandaria" scenario. You can queue from the Dungeon Finder or use Lorewalker Cho's Dream Brew.

Objectives.Text: "The Dark Heart of Pandaria" scenario complete
